mapper.select: /* 1. ID: selectDesc 2. 업무명: 관리자의 상세보기 3. 업무설명: */ select doc_seq ,party_cd ,doc_title ,doc_info ,img_src_nm, img_nail_nm, doc_from, doc_url ,doc_stat ,doc_read ,reg_id ,reg_dtm ,show_id ,show_dtm ,cancel_id ,cancel_dtm ,del_id ,del_dtm from CRBN_MUN_NEWS WHERE doc_seq = #{docSeq}

/* 1. ID: selectBeforeAfter 2. 업무명: 이전, 이후 seq 구함 3. 업무설명: */ select 'preSeq' doc_title, IFNULL(max(doc_seq),0) doc_seq from CRBN_MUN_NEWS where doc_seq < #{docSeq} and doc_stat = 'V' union all select 'sufSeq' doc_title, IFNULL(min(doc_seq),0) doc_seq from CRBN_MUN_NEWS where doc_seq > #{docSeq} and doc_stat = 'V'

/* 1. ID: selectList 2. 업무명: 모바일의 리스트 3. 업무설명: */ select doc_seq, doc_title ,img_src_nm, img_nail_nm, doc_from, doc_url , DATE_FORMAT(show_dtm,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS show_dtm from CRBN_MUN_NEWS WHERE party_cd = #{partyCd} and doc_stat = 'V' order by show_dtm desc LIMIT #{pageNo} , #{listSize}

/* 1. ID: selectListCount 2. 업무명: 뉴스 3. 업무설명: 뉴스 리스트 총갯수 */
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CRBN_MUN_NEWS WHERE party_cd = #{partyCd} and doc_stat = 'V'

/* 1. ID: selectList 2. 업무명: 모바일의 상세조회 3. 업무설명: */ select doc_seq, doc_title ,img_src_nm, img_nail_nm, doc_from, doc_url ,doc_read, doc_rcmnd, doc_like,doc_sad,doc_angry , DATE_FORMAT(show_dtm,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS show_dtm from CRBN_MUN_NEWS WHERE doc_seq = #{docSeq} and doc_stat = 'V'
mapper.update: /* 1. ID: updateStat 2. 업무명: 문서를 front로배포 상태로 변경 3. 업무설명: N : 등록상태 V : 게시상태 C : 게시취소 D : 삭제 */ UPDATE CRBN_MUN_NEWS SET doc_stat = 'V' ,show_id = #{showId} ,show_dtm = now() WHERE doc_seq = #{docSeq}
/* 1. ID: updateStat 2. 업무명: 문서르 배포취소 상태 변경 3. 업무설명: N : 등록상태 V : 게시상태 C : 게시취소 D : 삭제 */ UPDATE CRBN_MUN_NEWS SET doc_stat = 'C' ,cancel_id = cancel_id ,cancel_dtm = now() WHERE doc_seq = #{docSeq}
/* 1. ID: updateDelStat 2. 업무명: 문서를 삭제상태 변경 3. 업무설명: N : 등록상태 V : 게시상태 C : 게시취소 D : 삭제 */ UPDATE CRBN_MUN_NEWS SET doc_stat = 'D' ,del_id = del_id ,del_dtm = now() WHERE doc_seq = #{docSeq}
/* 1. ID: addReadCnt 2. 업무명: 읽음 건수 추가 3. 업무설명: */ UPDATE CRBN_MUN_NEWS SET doc_read = doc_read + 1 WHERE doc_seq = #{docSeq}
/* 1. ID: addRcmndCnt 2. 업무명: 추천 건수 추가 3. 업무설명: */ UPDATE CRBN_MUN_NEWS SET doc_rcmnd = doc_rcmnd + 1 WHERE doc_seq = #{docSeq}
/* 1. ID: addLikeCnt 2. 업무명: like 건수 추가 3. 업무설명: */ UPDATE CRBN_MUN_NEWS SET doc_like = doc_like + 1 WHERE doc_seq = #{docSeq}
/* 1. ID: addSadCnt 2. 업무명: 읽음 건수 추가 3. 업무설명: */ UPDATE CRBN_MUN_NEWS SET doc_sad = doc_sad + 1 WHERE doc_seq = #{docSeq}
/* 1. ID: addSadCnt 2. 업무명: 읽음 건수 추가 3. 업무설명: */ UPDATE CRBN_MUN_NEWS SET doc_angry = doc_angry + 1 WHERE doc_seq = #{docSeq}
mapper.select: /* 1. ID: selectLatestList 2. 업무명: 모바일의 최근 5건 조회 리스트 3. 업무설명: */ select doc_seq, doc_title ,img_src_nm, img_nail_nm, doc_from, doc_url , DATE_FORMAT(show_dtm,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS show_dtm from CRBN_MUN_NEWS WHERE party_cd = #{partyCd} and doc_stat = 'V' order by show_dtm desc limit 0, 5
